entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • public IReadOnlyCollection<string> with private backing field throws exception when trying to add migration #34996

Closed

  • Issue Running EF Core Migration Bundle in .NET SDK Container Image on Linux Debian (WSL2) #34979
  • EF Core - SQLClient includes all columns from a joined table in the SQL query, even when only one field is explicitly selected #34980
  • Scaffolded migrations are invalid when a type in the global namespace is referenced #34993
    10.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonReaderException: '0x00' is invalid after a single JSON value. Expected end of data. #34960
    10.0.0
  • Owned Properties don't support ComplexType. #34992

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] Update macOS images to 13 #35005
    tell-mode
  • [release/9.0-staging] Update macOS images to 13 #35004
    tell-mode
  • Update macOS images to 13 #35003
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.44.1 to 3.45.0 #35002
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Better cast/convert support for Cosmos #35000
  • Support translating some string functions when they have a char parameters #34999
  • Allow SqlFragmentExpression to have a type/type mapping #34995

Merged

  • Bump Azure.Identity from 1.13.0 to 1.13.1 #35001
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [TINY] Do not return null namespace for Types #34994
  • Update .Sources package reference #34973
  • Fix to #34960 - System.Text.Json.JsonReaderException: '0x00' is invalid after a single JSON value. Expected end of data #34969

Updated

  • Apply fix from #34729 to Cosmos SqlExpressionFactory to keep it in sync #34964
